name: Cascara sagrada
Relationship: Compare: Hyd.; Nux.; Rhammus Californica (tincture for constipation; tympanites and appendicitis and especially rheumatism).

Urine: Must wait for minutes before flow starts then first in drops
Extremities: RHEUMATISM OF MUSCLES AND JOINTS, WITH OBSTINATE CONSTIPATION

details: Introduced as a palliative for constipation (non-homeopathic), fifteen drops of fluid extract here it restores normal function by its tonic effects, but it has a wider sphere of action, as careful provings will show. Chronic indigestion, cirrhosis and jaundice. Hemorrhoids and constipation. Gastric headache Broad, flabby tongue; foul breath.Palliative in constipation, as an intestinal tonic, and dyspepsia dependent thereon. 10-15 Drops of tincture.
